Assign Promotion Group

Use the Assign Promotion Group dialog box (Actions | Promotion Group | Assign) to assign a promotion group to one or more versioned files or projects, or a project database to associate them with a particular promotion group.

Field Descriptions

General Tab
Assign promotion group Select a promotion group to assign to the selected item. You can select any promotion group that has been configured for the project (from Admin | Configure Project).
To revision Enter the revision to which you want the promotion group assigned, or click the Browse button to select one. The Browse button enables you to select files by revision, version label, or promotion group.
If promotion group exists Select one of the following actions to occur if a promotion group has already been assigned to the file.
Prompt to prompt for confirmation before assigning the promotion group
Reassign to reassign the promotion group without prompt
Don't reassign to prevent the promotion group from being assigned
Include files in subprojects This field is available only when the selected item is a project or project database. Select to assign the promotion group to all projects and files included in the project or project database.
Selected Files Tab
File list Review the selected files or projects to which you want to assign a promotion group.
Properties button Click to display information on the item selected. You can view information on the item selected, including workspace settings and granted privileges.
